Summary: The first three days of the course on Text Analytics, taking place from February 10-12, 2025, will cover topics such as course introduction, text preparation, categorizing text into topics of concern, and extracting information from text. The instructors, Fan Zhenzhen and Wang Aobo, will lead workshops and mini projects to provide hands-on learning opportunities. The course will also include a workshop on creating categories and a mini project on extracting information from text. The course will be held from 9am to 5pm each day.
